effect.sun_moon: Changes the user’s type to a type either resistant or immune to the last damaging move that hit it. The new type is selected at random and cannot be a type the user already is. If there is no eligible new type, this move will fail.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Changes the user’s type to a type either resistant or immune to the last damaging move that hit it. The new type is selected at random and cannot be a type the user already is. If there is no eligible new type, this move will fail.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Changes the user’s type to a type either resistant or immune to the last damaging move that hit it. The new type is selected at random and cannot be a type the user already is. If there is no eligible new type, this move will fail.

short_effect.sun_moon: Changes the user’s type to a random type either resistant or immune to the last move used against it.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Changes the user’s type to a random type either resistant or immune to the last move used against it.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Changes the user’s type to a random type either resistant or immune to the last move used against it.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the attack the opponent used last.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the attack the opponent used last.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the attack the opponent used last.
